channel.title: Diversity614|Flawless Pking|Semi-Eco
channel.description:
[U][B][CENTER]Forums[/CENTER][/B][/U]
[CENTER][url=http://diversity614.com/forums/]Diversity614 Forums[/url][/CENTER]
[U][B][CENTER]Webclient[/CENTER][/B][/U]
[CENTER][url=http://diversity614.com/play/]Diversity614 - Webclient[/url][/CENTER]
[U][B][CENTER]Downloadable Client[/CENTER][/B][/U]
[CENTER][url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/312um70hj7mpk5o/ANTICLIENT614.jar]Downloadable Client[/url][/CENTER]
[U][B][CENTER]Vote4Cash[/CENTER][/B][/U]
[CENTER][url=http://www.diversity614.com/vote/]Diversity614 - Voting[/url] [/CENTER] [B][CENTER]Donate[/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER][url=http://www.diversity614.com/donate/]Diversity614 Donation Page[/url][/CENTER]
[U][B][CENTER]Brief Description[/CENTER][/B][/U]
[SIZE=4][SIZE=3][FONT=Courier New]Diversity614 originated from a Spawnscape Source created by Jet Kai. Our first intentions of creating a 614 server were to rebuild what is last of the 614 community and to bring back the glorious days of hybriding which many have lost due to the recent precautions of which Jagex are taking to eliminate private servers in general. Diversity614 was found by Mike, Bladex and Larry. Our goal is to bring back the old community that once was. Providing Bladex with the proper outline of updates in which would supplement the players, Bladex began working tirelessly until he managed to overcome all of the tasks given to him in just under a few days, with the recent clan chat addition/weapon special additions (g maul/dragon spear/dragon mace) and much more, Diversity614 began to accumulate a slowly growing community consistent of mainly hybrids. Listed below are some of our unique features and or additions which have been implemented as our server began. [/FONT][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[U][B][CENTER]Features[/CENTER][/B][/U]
[CENTER][U]Clanchat Dragon spear (working special like runescape) Granite maul (working special like runescape) Dragon mace (working special like runescape) Voteshop system Pvp Timer Shops (re-written shophandler/shops in general) Pvp System ::zerker/::pure (ease of access) Custom yells Custom ;;settag Pk titles (mobolising armies .. no not leached ) PKP shops Character design (;;char, redesigns your character with proper interfaces) Flawless switching Fight pits Autocasting Pk based economy Working spellbooks Working clanwars 24.7 Uptime Vote4Tokens Trading Webclient AutoCasting 100% Private Messaging Helpful staff 4 Levels of Donator status Regular updates! Lag Free! 100% working leeches Runescape like Combat Redone accuracy to be like runescape Multi Barrages Xp Counter Working weapon specs and effects Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars All Spirit shields working, even their affects. Working Teleblock Staff of light Special Yell with custom tags Daily Tournament Events Dice Rank[/CENTER] [/U]
[U][B][CENTER] [SIZE=5]Media;[/SIZE][/CENTER][/B][/U] [CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CDhMl46.jpg?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iqf3Adh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SSj9r6G.jpg?1[/img] [url=http://imgflip.com/i/2hpy3][img]http://i.imgflip.com/2hpy3.gif[/img][/url][url=http://imgflip.com/gifgenerator] [img]http://i.imgflip.com/2f9f0.gif[/img][/url][url=http://imgflip.com/gifgenerator] [/url][img]http://i.imgflip.com/2i2a4.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgflip.com/2i26h.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgflip.com/2i6kg.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgflip.com/2lc1e.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Aa0UyUq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pysWTzu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7Y2EOEj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VLffK5Y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wkZib0v.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oq4Z941.png[/img][/CENTER] [url=http://imgflip.com/i/2nqhm][img]http://i.imgflip.com/2nqhm.gif[/img][/url]

[CENTER]Brief Description[/CENTER]

[SIZE=4][SIZE=3][FONT=Courier New]Diversity614 originated from a Spawnscape Source created by Jet Kai. Our first intentions of creating a 614 server were to rebuild what is last of the 614 community and to bring back the glorious days of hybriding which many have lost due to the recent precautions of which Jagex are taking to eliminate private servers in general. Diversity614 was found by Mike, Bladex and Larry. Our goal is to bring back the old community that once was. Providing Bladex with the proper outline of updates in which would supplement the players, Bladex began working tirelessly until he managed to overcome all of the tasks given to him in just under a few days, with the recent clan chat addition/weapon special additions (g maul/dragon spear/dragon mace) and much more, Diversity614 began to accumulate a slowly growing community consistent of mainly hybrids. Listed below are some of our unique features and or additions which have been implemented as our server began.
[/FONT][/SIZE][/SIZE]

[CENTER]Features[/CENTER]

[CENTER]Clanchat
Dragon spear (working special like runescape)
Granite maul (working special like runescape)
Dragon mace (working special like runescape)

Pvp Timer
Shops (re-written shophandler/shops in general)

Pk titles (mobolising armies … no not leached )
PKP shops

Fight pits

Working clanwars

Working weapon specs and effects
Working curses prayer book, including turmoil!
All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars
All Spirit shields working, even their affects.
Working Teleblock
Staff of light Special
Yell with custom tags
Daily Tournament Events
Dice Rank[/CENTER]
